sources.title: Shotgun (1955) STERLING HAYDEN
sources.description:
It's FRIDAY @PizzaFLIX 
Stars: Sterling Hayden, Yvonne DeCarlo, Zachary Scott
Story: Rory Calhoun
Director: Lesley Selander

After his fellow Lawman is murdered, a US Marshall sets out to bring in the killer... dead or alive.

metadata.Plot: Clay Hardin, a Deputy U.S. Marshal, is about to turn in his badge and take the job as the territory's Indian commissioner until the notorious Ben Thompson slays the marshal when he tried to make an arrest. Clay turns his back on a white-collar job and his girl to pursue the gang. Picking up a bounty hunter and a beautiful half-breed woman along the way, the little band follows the trail into Apache land where the lawman discovers that the outlaws plan to sell repeating rifles to the Indians.
metadata.Writer: Clarke Reynolds, Rory Calhoun, John C. Champion
metadata.Actors: Sterling Hayden, Yvonne De Carlo, Zachary Scott
